page.title: 10WATER SPORTS AT LOSSIEMOUTH.
page.content: The golden beaches of Lossiemouth provide excellent opportunities for various types of water sports. Wind-surfing and swimming are very popular,also sailing,fishing,canoeing and water ski-ing. For the keen angler,the best places are at the mouth of the River Lossie, (whose name incidentally is derived from the Latin word for salmon),off the point of the pier or along the east beach,where the craftier fishers use "spinners" to catch sea trout. These are "lures" made from shiny metal to resemble a sand-eel. Each summer a Raft Race is held on the River Lossie with local organisations competing for grand prizes.
